package main

#init
func main() {
	print(1+1)
	print(0+1)
	print(1+0)

	print("-")

	print(1*1)
	print(1*0)
	print(0*1)

	print("-")

	print(5/1)
	print(1/5)
	print(0/1)

	print("-")

	print(1-1)
	print(0-1)
	print(1-0)

	print("-")

	print(1%5)
	print(6%5)
	print(-1%5)
}
---
2
1
1
-
1
0
0
-
5
0
0
-
0
-1
1
-
1
1
-1
